meanings.definition: Relating to or derived from only one parent.
meanings.sent1: The uniparentally inherited trait was easily recognizable in the offspring.
meanings.sent2: The genetic disorder was uniparentally passed down from the mother.
meanings.sent3: The uniparentally dominant gene made the family reunions quite interesting.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for music seemed uniparentally linked to her father's side of the family.
meanings.sent5: The uniparentally determined eye color was a striking feature of the newborn baby.

meanings.definition: Involving or occurring through only one parent.
meanings.sent1: The uniparentally fertilized egg developed into a healthy organism.
meanings.sent2: The uniparentally raised offspring showed unique behavioral patterns.
meanings.sent3: The uniparentally planned family vacation turned into a comedy of errors.
meanings.sent4: The uniparentally guided project was a success beyond expectations.
meanings.sent5: The uniparentally influenced decision led to unexpected consequences.
